definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: With a shadowy triumph, she trims the swimming-suit rim at the swimming-pool fringe.
sentences.chinese: 她帶著暗淡的喜悅在泳池邊整理泳裝的邊緣。

sentences.english: With adim triumph, she trims the swimming-suit rim at the swimming-pool brim.
sentences.chinese: 她帶着暗淡的喜悅在泳池邊整頓泳裝的邊沿。

sentences.english: I should watch you wearing bikini running at Bali beach.
sentences.chinese: 我應該看到你穿三點式泳裝在巴厘島上。

sentences.english: She became known after appearing on the cover of the Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue.
sentences.chinese: 她真正走紅是在登上《體育畫報》的泳裝專刊之後。

sentences.english: The communal bath is a "naked bath", so you're not allowed to wear a swimsuit.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的大衆池是裸浴，泡的時候不能穿泳裝。

sentences.english: Her bathing suit is smaller than the price tag.
sentences.chinese: 她的泳裝比價錢牌還小。

sentences.english: The new bikini has no room to put the logo.
sentences.chinese: 這件新比基尼泳裝連打上商標的地方都沒有。

sentences.english: But the news said that there are eight model girls in the swimming suits having shows in SHAOLIN TEMPLE.
sentences.chinese: 但是新聞上說八個模特穿着泳裝在少林走秀啊。

sentences.english: There were grains of sand ih the crotch of her swimming costume.
sentences.chinese: 她的泳裝褲襠裏有一些沙粒。

sentences.english: Brook has also done a large amount of commercial swimwear, sportswear and hosiery modeling.
sentences.chinese: 布魯克還做了大量的商業泳裝，運動裝和針織品建模。

sentences.english: But the new swimsuits have drawn criticism from both East and West.
sentences.chinese: 但是這類新泳裝已經招致來自東西方的批評。

sentences.english: With a dim triumph， she trims the swimming-suit rim at the swimming-pool brim.
sentences.chinese: 她帶着暗淡的喜悅在泳池邊整理泳裝的邊緣。

sentences.english: Speedos have since become a controversial piece of swimwear.
sentences.chinese: Speedos自此便成爲頗受爭議的泳裝。

definition: photobook (loanword from Japanese), generally sexy portraits of an actress or model
lower body/euphemism for genitals/root and stem of plants
